summary: [Script Dragon inside] This mod allows finer control of the perk points granted while leveling.  It also contains a perk reset function.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][color=red]Due to the changes with the 1.4 patch (near complete restructuring of the code and such) this will be put on hold for a bit.  I will most likely release a version made using the construction kit shortly after it comes out.[/color][/size]

[size=7]Enhanced Perk Points[/size] by xenofixus
CURRENT VERSION: 1.2 (December 22, 2011)
CURRENT SCRIPT DRAGON VERSION: 1.3.10.0 (December 22, 2011)


[color=red][size=4]This is a Script Dragon plugin. Script Dragon is NO LONGER included[/size][/color]
Please visit [url=http://forums.bethsoft.com/index.php?/topic/1315020-rel-script-dragon]http://forums.bethsoft.com/index.php?/topic/1315020-rel-script-dragon[/url]
or [url=http://alexander.sannybuilder.com/?category=other&altname=skyrim_script_dragon]http://alexander.sannybuilder.com/?category=other&altname=skyrim_script_dragon[/url] to download the latest version of Script Dragon

[color=red][size=4]COMPATIBLE WITH ALL SKYRIM VERSIONS!!![/size][/color]
as of December 22, 2011
[color=red][size=5]READ THE CHANGELOG!!![/size][/color]

[size=4]Summary:[/size]
This plugin allows you to finely tune the amount of perk points that are granted when you level.  There is the standard \'x\' perk points per level.  There is also a \'bonus level\' feature where every \'x\' levels you get a bonus perk point (everything is configurable).

NEW FEATURE: Starting Points, start out at level 1 with a set amount of points!
NEW FEATURE: directly control the amount of points gained for EACH LEVEL!

The plugin also features a perk reset function.  I know there is another Script Dragon plugin out that does this (in fact I am using some of his (hitachihex) code to modify the perk points) but I wanted to make sure that when you reset the perks, the perk points were granted to you based on the leveling-scheme you chose.

\'Official\' thread: [url=http://forums.bethsoft.com/index.php?/topic/1299916-rel-enhanced-perk-points]http://forums.bethsoft.com/index.php?/topic/1299916-rel-enhanced-perk-points[/url]


[size=4]Installation:[/size]
There are two versions uploaded, one with Script Dragon, and one without it.  To install simply extract to your Skyrim installation folder.  Please note that the .asi and .ini can also be located in your base directory (but it will look messier!). It should be setup similar to this:[quote]\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\dinput8.dll
\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\ScriptDragon.dll
\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\asi\\enhancedperkpoints.asi
\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\asi\\enhancedperkpoints.ini[/quote]
[size=4]Configuration:[/size]
Open the enhancedperkpoints.ini file located inside of the asi directory and change it to your liking.  Please note that ridiculous settings have not been tested. 


[size=4]Bugs/Quirks:[/size]

[size=4]Source:[/size]
The source code is included inside the src folder.
